title: Scalability Fundamentals
description: Learn the basics of horizontal and vertical scaling for distributed systems

title: Load Balancing Strategies
description: Understand different load balancing techniques and their applications

title: Database Design and Sharding
description: Master database design patterns, normalization, and sharding strategies

title: Caching Strategies and Patterns
description: Learn different caching layers, cache invalidation, and distributed caching

title: Microservices Architecture Design
description: Design microservices systems with proper service boundaries and communication

title: System Design Case Studies
description: Analyze real-world system designs like Twitter, Netflix, and Uber
